law.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:
"Department" means the Department of Parks.
"Commissioner" means the commissioner of parks.
"Commission" means the State Property and Buildings Commission.
"Prisoner of war" means any regularly appointed, enrolled, enlisted, or inducted member of the military forces of the United States who was captured, separated, and incarcerated by an enemy of the United States.
"Sanctuary" means a place of refuge where wildlife is maintained and protected from depredation and destruction.
"Wildlife" means all living things that are neither human nor domesticated, including but not limited to mammals, reptiles, amphibians, birds, fishes, crustaceans, mollusks, trees, shrubs, vines, wildflowers, and nonflowering plants.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 189, sec. 1. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 1.
